name: Project_Saaga_Complete_Demo
description: Complete workflow package for Project Saaga AI video automation
WARNING: ⚠️ ALL API KEYS AND CREDENTIALS HAVE BEEN REMOVED FOR SECURITY. Replace all placeholder values (YOUR_*_ID, YOUR_*_KEY) with actual credentials before importing to n8n.

overview.purpose: Automated AI news video production pipeline

workflow_sequence: 2. WF2_Video_Generator - Create AI videos with lip-sync (manual)
3. Manual Review - Human operator reviews preview video

workflows.name: WF1_Script_Factory
workflows.description: Automated news script generation using OpenAI GPT-4
workflows.note: Creates news scripts and saves to Google Sheets

workflows.name: WF2_Video_Generator
workflows.description: Manual video generation with AI lip-sync and voiceover
workflows.note: Generates video and saves to preview folder for manual review

workflows.name: WF3_YouTube_Publisher
workflows.description: Manual YouTube publishing after human approval
workflows.note: Uploads video to YouTube with metadata and updates status

setup_instructions: 1. Import each workflow file separately to n8n
2. Configure all credentials (OpenAI, Fal.ai, Google OAuth2, YouTube OAuth2)
3. Update Google Sheets document ID and folder IDs if using different resources
4. Test WF1 first to generate a script
5. Test WF2 with a News ID from WF1 output
7. Test WF3 to publish to YouTube
8. Activate WF1 schedule for automated script generation
security_notes: ⚠️ This demo file does NOT contain any API keys or secrets
⚠️ All credential IDs have been replaced with YOUR_*_ID placeholders
⚠️ Do NOT commit actual credentials to version control
⚠️ Store sensitive data in n8n's credential system
⚠️ YouTube OAuth2 must be authenticated with correct brand account
